title: Banning Scipters over negative players.
body:
How come there are so many scripters in league not getting banned? Don't you think scripters should be banned before negative players. I mean at the end of the day anyone can get a little frustrated. Video games are a healthy way to manage stress, I don't encourage negative behavior but banning people from a stress reliever is a bit counter productive. Reform is very important. Those who curse should be chat banned, those who intentionally feed (which is rarer than people claim) should be placed in a new division that is lower than bronze that can only be left by having a series of games focused on positive kda. But even so, people who script do it very intentionally. They take the fun out of the game. They add to the stress. In fact I am sure many players become toxic after being matched up against scripters.  If there were no scripters there would be less toxic people too. I think riot should change its priority towards banning scripters over behavior management. Every year the community seems to become more toxic regardless. Getting rid of scripters seems like a much better way of improving the community. 

I played this game for 5 years and now I want to quit because scripters have taken my dream away of becoming high rank. How can you take pride winning when you cheat? That is like bragging about money you stole from someones life savings. Where is the honor?

> I know riot bans scripters, but to be ranked number one most played game before they really should up their priority for fair play.

Ok, being real for a minute,
1) If you play AP jinx, you deserve to be bronze. I would say this to any player who does this or actually deserves to be there. The first step in improving is knowing you need to improve. Doesn't mean you can't get out,  just means you need to learn the what's what. Take the advice of a guy who has been to bronze and gotten out.
2) Look up builds on [Champion.gg](http://champion.gg/), watch informative streamers like [NEACE](https://www.twitch.tv/neace). Literally the only thing keeping any player in league in their current tier is themselves. It is upon you to learn about the game, and improve. I'll even sit down with you in discord and help guide you on the right path.
3) "Muh Team" or "Their Team" is not a valid excuse. I can climb out of bronze from any division within 30 games. Not trying to brag or whatever but I have spent the time to actually learn the game and just know more about the game. You can learn too. YOU are the only consistent in your games, everyone else is meaningless. 

I hope you take my advice with a grain of salt. I'm truly not trying to be a jerk, I would say and DID say the same exact thing to my best friends when they were starting to play. My offer to "coach" is 100% legit. Send me a FR @Psyrik on league, and i will sit down with you and help start you on a path to learn the game and to improve and climb. Complaining about trolls, scripters, afkers, and other shenanigans doesn't help you improve. Accepting you need to is the start to climb out of any elo under challenger. :)
